descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is an examination of sex differences and similarities. Explanations for differences will be evaluated, as well as the effects of gender on achievement, relationships and mental health. Presented in a five-week format, this course meets for five Saturdays from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm: 4/2, 4/9, 4/16, 4/23, 4/30. First class attendance is mandatory. Carries social science credit.
